title: Educational resources for parents teaching value literacy
description: Educational resources for parents teaching value literacy
content:
Scenario: Educational resources for parents teaching value literacy
    Given Sarah wants to teach value literacy effectively
    And she needs pedagogical support for home education
    When Sarah accesses educational resources
    Then the educational_elohim should provide parent education materials
    And resources should be developmentally appropriate for different ages
    And guidance should help Sarah teach Tommy differently than Emma
    And Sarah should have tools to be effective value literacy educator
    And parent education should be supported systematically
